title: Clash of Clans and Clash Royale mobile revenue 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Games.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 597.0 is found at Game Clash Royale and the minimum is found at Clash of Clans where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 567.0.
The highest Game Clash Royale has 30.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Game Clash of Clans.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Games.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Games.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 597.0 is found at Game Clash Royale and the minimum is found at Clash of Clans where Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 567.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Game in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
There is a difference of 30.0 between the maximum Game Clash Royale and minimum Game Clash of Clans.
Considered together, the average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 2 Games is roughly 582.0.
Summing up the values of all Games, we get total 1164.0.
